channel.title: Chaos Returns 742 [Hamachi]
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Chaos Returns[/size]
Hello, First off i want to say that yes i am hosting this on Hamachi and there is a perfectly good reason for that which you will find if you download the server, there is a file in the folder that says "Useful Information" if you download please take your time to read it
Let us begin. Chaos Returns is a 718 loading 742 Runescape Private Server that is ran through Hamachi. Every single skill is 100% Working except from Dungeoneering which has been started but isn't completely finished. I will list some of the features that this server has to offer below.
- Change character appearance and gender. - 742 items and npcs - Working double xp weekend, [Friday - Sunday] - Perfect PvM & PvP - All Mini-Games 100% And so much more...
There will be a folder called "Pictures" when you download. there you will be able to see what the server has to offer. sorry that i am not uploading any to this, i may soon just not right now so bare with me.
And finally. This server is simply to have fun and for anyone that wants a small (pass-time). This means that i do not want any foul language or behavior, this sounds bad but i want a nice and calm environment so that everyone can just have a good time.
Also, Please no bad comments to this thread, i don't want any hassle for just posting a server advertisement, Feel free to Rep++, feels weird saying that, Never have before :P But anyway come on and enjoy yourself Need anymore detail? Inbox Me.
Hamachi Details User - Chaos Returns Pass - 123 [Caps are at start of both words in the user]
Download Link Currently Being Uploaded To DropBox

@562-Pro wrote:

[size=24pt]Chaos Returns[/size]

Hello, First off i want to say that yes i am hosting this on Hamachi and there is a perfectly good reason for that which you will find if you download the server, there is a file in the folder that says “Useful Information” if you download please take your time to read it

Let us begin.
Chaos Returns is a 718 loading 742 Runescape Private Server that is ran through Hamachi.
Every single skill is 100% Working except from Dungeoneering which has been started but isn’t
completely finished.
I will list some of the features that this server has to offer below.

  • Change character appearance and gender.
  • 742 items and npcs
  • Working double xp weekend, [Friday - Sunday]
  • Perfect PvM & PvP
  • All Mini-Games 100%
    And so much more…

There will be a folder called “Pictures” when you download. there you will be able to see
what the server has to offer. sorry that i am not uploading any to this, i may soon just not right now
so bare with me.

And finally.
This server is simply to have fun and for anyone that wants a small (pass-time).
This means that i do not want any foul language or behavior, this sounds bad but i want a
nice and calm environment so that everyone can just have a good time.

Also, Please no bad comments to this thread, i don’t want any hassle for just posting a server
advertisement, Feel free to Rep++, feels weird saying that, Never have before
But anyway come on and enjoy yourself
